mapper.insert: INSERT INTO alarm_history ( event_type, resource_id, resource_type, occure_dt, account_id, urgency, plan, note, occure_date, csp_type, alarm_impl, project_cd ) VALUES ( #{eventType}, #{resourceId}, #{resourceType}, #{occureDt}, #{accountId}, #{urgency}, #{plan}, #{note}, #{occureDate}, #{cspType}, 'mail', #{projectCd} )
